reviews.customers_say: Customers find the bra comfortable, with one noting its wide straps, and appreciate its good fit and great support. The bra receives positive feedback for its quality, softness, and value for money. Regarding size and sturdiness, opinions are mixed - while some say the sizing is correct and the bra stays in place without riding up, others report that the cup size runs small and the straps keep sliding off the shoulde

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely comfortable and supportive love love
items.body: I've gained a lot of weight very quickly with an automaton disease.I seem to habeen herited , this unfortunately has made it difficult as I have also been a lot of weight in my chest, thus, bringing my brush size up further than it's ever been. I've had nothing but problems trying to find a bra that not only fits but fits comfortably around the ribs as well. This bra is amazing. It doesn't even feel like I'm wearing a bra while still. Giving me the support. I need the sides are very comfortable. Fit very well and come with a justible strap for the back. The straps on the shoulders are very soft and very adjustubborn. Completely support my brush exactly where they need to be. I would highly recommend this.This is the kind of bra you could live in.I will be ordering more Read more
items.author: Darlene

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ladies!!!!!!
items.body: I rely on thorough reviews when I'm considering a purchase, so I hope this helps someone out there! :) This is literally the first bra I've ever had that I actually forget I'm wearing one! I don't have to rip it off at the end of the day for relief, and I've even slept in it perfectly comfortably! Also the fabric is very comfortable and doesn't make me itchy or rub me the wrong way anywhere. I can't remember what they recommended for size, but an XL fit me perfectly, I am 40c/38d. If you are unsure of band size because sometimes they run small, do not size up. These come with an extender if you need it, but I doubt you'll need it. These are not actually a pushup, but they hold you up nicely, unlike other flimsy wireless options. There is no extra padding, but the cup is supportive and my very prominent thermometers do not show through. The girls don't slide underneath and I NEVER have to readjust!!! I've had alot of wide banded bras--this is the first that does not budge or roll (and I am a chunky girl)!!! Does it do anything extra to make your chunky back look smooth? Not really, but it lays flat and doesn't strangle your backfat and make it look worse (iykyk!) and the bra is practically invisible under clothes. Again, stays in place, no readjusting throughout the day!!! Now bra straps-- they are the bane of my existence. I have a short upper torso, which means I can't wear anything unless its adjustable, and even alot of adjustable things are still too long. Not with this bra! I adjusted it to perfection and it didnt even require me to crank it all the way down! Once you have your straps adjusted perfectly, they stay in place, no readjusting or sliding!!! Plus they are super soft and comfy. Also, the girls stay separated and aren't smooshed together and suffocating--very important during these hot, miserably sweaty months! For real, I have purchased a lot of these type of bras that look like this one in the picture, but what arrives on your doorstep is disappointment. This one is the real deal!!! Plus I love the dusty rose color--it is my perfect nude and I couldnt see it under my cream colored blouse like I can with the typical nude shades. I just came back to purchase 4 more--2 dusty rose, and 2 black. I'm all set! I've also seen reviews that say this bra minimizes, but it does not (if you don't want it to). It just holds you. I think if you are getting an undesirable minimizing effect, you probably just need to size up and let those girls breathe! :) To those who are disappointed that this isn't an actual padded pushup, I highly recommend Torrid wireless pushup bras. I have several (and still keeping for when I want a little oomph). Their sizing is spot on, they're super comfy, they do push up, they don't slide around, and they wash well. Yes, they can be pricey (watch for sales, they have good ones!), but they are very quality and well worth the money. I've had mine for several years, half the time I just throw them in with my regular wash, hang dry, and they still look practically new! I get the satiny ones and I've had no pilling or snags! Read more
items.author: Angela Harris

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is the one!
items.body: This wireless bra has impressed me, unlike so many others tried in the past. The banding underneath is wide and that makes the difference for me. It is very comfortable and wearable all day into the evening. I don't feel like I have to take it off as soon as I get home. The straps are wide and have easy sliding adjustments. It holds you up and fits well around the body. My only complaint is that it is difficult to hook, with 4 hooks to deal with in the back. I know this is a personal issue, but I have not had this much trouble getting in and out of other bras. It also comes with an extension which is nice if you need that extra room. Overall, very comfortable and likeable. And a good price too! Read more
items.author: Nancy T.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable support in an affordable bra
items.body: I was shocked by how well this bra fits and how comfortable it is. I liked it so much I ordered another. I've been paying over $60 for bras and can't believe that this is much more comfortable and supportive than the expensive ones. The bra is washable in the washing machine (I hang it to dry), the size recommended was perfect. The only flaw is that it fastens in the back but I solved that problem by fastening it by turning it to the front before I slip the straps over my shoulders. Problem solved. Read more
items.author: Jan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's my favorite bra right now, but it does have some issues.
items.body: These bras are super comfortable but I am a larger lady (46D with a large belly that probably pushes up against the bra). I'm constantly having to adjust the straps. They don't stay adjusted. They slip back in less than an hour after I adjusted them forward. And that sometimes causes the girls to make a little muffin top over the cups. The cups are plenty big. That is not the issue. The band rolls up on me too. I don't wear a lot of thin tshirts that I'd be real worried about it showing. so I am ok with it. I haven't found a bra yet that doesn't roll on me. I'm sure it would be better if I wasn't so overweight. The bra doesn't keep the ladies totally separated either. But, since I have to adjust the straps a lot, I adjust that at the same time. I don't feel like it gives the look of uniboob. If the straps would stay adjusted, I believe they'd stay more separated. Might try a tack stitch to keep them in place and see how that works. All these things make it sound like I hate this bra, but honestly, I don't. It's actually my favorite bra. I have lots of bras but none that have no underwire have supported me as well as this one. And the underwire ones are supremely uncomfortable. Read more
items.author: Sweetheart75

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Skin Color, Sand, Cream White, Skin, Black, Coffee, Nude, Dusty Rose. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
